works.title: Astro portfolio
works.body: Astro portfolio is a small website that I did in practice purposes. Astro is an innovative static site generator that empowers developers to create stunning portfolios. With its flexible architecture, component-driven development, and optimized build process, Astro offers a seamless and efficient way to showcase your skills and creativity. It's the perfect tool for crafting impressive portfolio websites.
works.author: Milan

works.title: Bolt
works.body: Bolt is a website I developed for Taraba company as an entry task, translating Figma designs into production-ready code efficiently and accurately.
works.projectTime: Time spent on this project is seven days.
works.author: Milan
